title: Red Desaturation Test
description:
This eye test is designed to reveal visual field defects in person's eyes in the most pleasant, intuitive and stress-free way for FREE.

Vision test is useful for:
- Prevention
- House visits
- Household tests for adults who have doubts if a doctor's visit is required


Features:
- Random test charts to eliminate boring and repeating experiences;
- Voice controls to help you navigate easier;
- Smooth and intuitive interface with animations.


Description:

According to several studies patients have visual complaints from 2 to 10 years before some types of optic nerve diseases were diagnosed.
If optic nerve diseases are detected early, visual loss may be reversible.
Red Desaturation is known to be a good indicator of neurological visual field defects.
This test may be taken even if retention of acuity and/or form perception are affected.

Patients with non-specific visual/vision loss should be checked for visual field defects by means of red desaturation test and central vision test.

The Red Desaturation Test is made with the best of intentions. The intuitive and flawless design allows you to navigate easily through the application. The voice guidance is provided during the test so that you don't need to move your mobile device near or far to read the instructions but instead you can hear the nice voice guiding you through different steps and actions. The voice can easily be muted and unmuted.

In the test one should identify if the given red areas have the same rich red color or the colors appear more desatured pink or orange. At the end of the test results will show whether the person may have neurological visual field defects or not for each eye separately.

More details about red desaturation, eye examination tests and trainings as well as other eye related topics can be found in our news.eyeexamtest.com blog.

The Red Desaturation Test is continuously under improvement so your feedback is appreciated!


Tips:

- Take the most comfortable position to relax.
- Have a mild nature light and no glare on the phone screen.
- Place your phone approx. 50 cm/20 inches from your eyes.
- Cover one eye at a time with your hand.
- Stare at the center of the screen. Do not let your eye drift.
- Try to identify if you see rich red or desaturated and washed out pinky/orange colors.


Supported Languages:

- English
- Russian


SEE ALSO:

We highly recommend using our Eye Care Plus that allows to pass a more detailed eye examination as well as train your eye muscles for better vision.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.eyeexamtest.eyecareplus


DISCLAIMER:

This application is not intended to replace optician's regular full examination. We recommend you get a full eye test after using it.
descriptionHTML:
This eye test is designed to reveal visual field defects in person's eyes in the most pleasant, intuitive and stress-free way for FREE.

Vision test is useful for:
- Prevention
- House visits
- Household tests for adults who have doubts if a doctor's visit is required


Features:
- Random test charts to eliminate boring and repeating experiences;
- Voice controls to help you navigate easier;
- Smooth and intuitive interface with animations.


Description:

According to several studies patients have visual complaints from 2 to 10 years before some types of optic nerve diseases were diagnosed.
If optic nerve diseases are detected early, visual loss may be reversible.
Red Desaturation is known to be a good indicator of neurological visual field defects.
This test may be taken even if retention of acuity and/or form perception are affected.

Patients with non-specific visual/vision loss should be checked for visual field defects by means of red desaturation test and central vision test.

The Red Desaturation Test is made with the best of intentions. The intuitive and flawless design allows you to navigate easily through the application. The voice guidance is provided during the test so that you don't need to move your mobile device near or far to read the instructions but instead you can hear the nice voice guiding you through different steps and actions. The voice can easily be muted and unmuted.

In the test one should identify if the given red areas have the same rich red color or the colors appear more desatured pink or orange. At the end of the test results will show whether the person may have neurological visual field defects or not for each eye separately.

More details about red desaturation, eye examination tests and trainings as well as other eye related topics can be found in our news.eyeexamtest.com blog.

The Red Desaturation Test is continuously under improvement so your feedback is appreciated!


Tips:

- Take the most comfortable position to relax.
- Have a mild nature light and no glare on the phone screen.
- Place your phone approx. 50 cm/20 inches from your eyes.
- Cover one eye at a time with your hand.
- Stare at the center of the screen. Do not let your eye drift.
- Try to identify if you see rich red or desaturated and washed out pinky/orange colors.


Supported Languages:

- English
- Russian


SEE ALSO:

We highly recommend using our Eye Care Plus that allows to pass a more detailed eye examination as well as train your eye muscles for better vision.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.eyeexamtest.eyecareplus


DISCLAIMER:

This application is not intended to replace optician's regular full examination. We recommend you get a full eye test after using it.

title: Best Way to Relieve Eye Strain
description:
Force Yourself to Take an Eye Break - EyeSaver that remind you to take breaks periodically,it’s an utility that helps avoiding eyes-related problems when spending too much time in front of a mobile screen. Concentrating your eyesight on a smartphone screen can cause an eye strain. 


EyeSaver give yourself the option to cancel those breaks when notification is coming, or leave the "Notify me only" checkbox empty to give EyeSaver complete control and force you to stop using smartphone. When it's time for a break, the app will lock your screen for the duration of your break, and it won't let you back in until your break is over.


EyeSaver has also the parenting features. It can enter the password-protected Parent Mode in which the user is forced to take breaks (during the break the mobile is locked). This is very useful since children often forget about the real world and play games much too long.


It's Simple but Effective!!!
Absolutely No Ads!!!
Now download and install full-featured for a 7-day trial.


Keyword: Eye tracking , Smartphone syndrome , Eye strain , Eye care , Myopia , Eyesight , Blue filter , Timer

title: Bluelight Filter for Eye Care - Auto screen filter
description:
Automatically adjust screen color according to external light to protect eyes

☆ Don't be robbed of a good night's sleep! 

Blue light from your smartphone or tablet causes strain on your eyes and prevents you from falling asleep easily at night.
This app adjusts your screen color to reduce the blue light and helps your eyes to relax, making it easier for you to fall asleep.


☆ Features


▽ Free Screen Filter App to Protect Your Eyes
You can reduce the strain on your eyes easily.
It is simple but effective!
All you have to do is launch this app.


▽ Screen Filter with Natural Color
This app's filter has a natural color so you can read news, emails and websites clearly.
This app doesn't dim the screen but adjusts the screen color to reduce blue light which causes strain on your eyes.
This natural color filter makes your smartphone screen shift to the screen for night.

▽ Auto mode
Automatically adjust screen color according to external light to protect eyes.

▽ Schedule mode
Turn on/off the screen filter according to the scheduled time.

▽ Screenshots without screen filter
Remove screen filters from the screenshots with the image processing AI technology.

▽ Easy Operation
It is easy to turn on or off with just one tap. 
You can adjust the opacity of the filter.
You can choose from 7 different filter colors. 


▽ Turn On or Off Quickly and Easily
You can choose to show or hide a filter icon in the status bar, making it easy to adjust the settings any time

▽ Startup Automatically
You can choose to launch this filter on startup. 


▽ Simple App
This app doesn`t drain your battery except when setting up the filter, since it only adjusts the color temperature. Moreover,  memory usage is also low.


▽  Reliable App
This app's developer has been registered as an official developer by an independent organization in Japan.


* If you want to install an app from a third party store. Please turn off the filter first to enable installation.
* If other screen adjustment apps are already  running on your smartphone or tablet, it may affect the screen color making it too dark for your eyes.

title: Color Blind Test: Eye Color Vision Test
description:
Have you ever wondered whether you're color-blind or not? 
Color Blind Test app helps you to identify color deficiency, reveals red, green or blue color blindness or any kind of color vision weakness. This Color Blindness Test includes Ishihara Color Vision Test. It is Free, easy and very intuitive!

Color Blindness test app contains some images of them clearly show and some of them is a little bit light colors when a user is color blind it will directly show message by selecting wrong answer. 
Color blindness problem is color vision deficiency which effects on 1 in 12 men and 1 in 200 women. This survey is taken from whole world and then these results were generated. According to a survey, there are 2.7 million colors blind people in Britain and most of them are male.
There are different causes of color blindness. Most of the people are color blind due to genetic 

We also mention some facts regarding color blindness and try to make awareness about this with some treatment.
 
Disclaimer
All the content has been referenced for authenticity, however, if there are any discrepancies please contact us via e-mail and we will take the necessary action or by mistaken if there is an error by the way.

We hope you will like this app and give great feedback to us!
Please rate us and leave you’re some nice comments... your feedback is very important to us for betterment of this app!
Thanks!

title: Color Blind Test
description:
What is color blindness? If the visual pigment of the cone cells is missing, the eye will not be able to distinguish colors in the normal way, which is called color vision loss or color blindness. Color blindness check is a common item in many physical examinations. In the color blindness check, each person's situation is different, and each picture is different. The color blindness physical examination treasure can help you familiarize yourself with the atlas before the physical examination, self-examination in advance, and recognize color blindness and color weakness.
 Features:
*Help you distinguish colors, distinguish between color blindness and weak color, and accurately feedback the perception of color vision.
* Freely choose the detection of color vision ability, strengthen the training of color vision recognition.
* Provide a variety of random pattern armor testing and training.
*Various types: Including digital, plane geometry, animal, daily necessities, and other inspection pictures.
*Generate detailed analysis reports and learn more about the professional restrictions, occupational restrictions, and genetics of color blindness
*Color blind tips, more knowledge about color blindness to answer for you.
【Other functions】
1. The brightness of the mobile phone is automatically adjusted to obtain accurate color vision test results.
2. Unlimited measurement times per day, anytime, anywhere measurement results are accurate and reliable.
3. Detailed measurement results, distinguish between full-color blindness, red blindness, green blindness, purple blindness, red-green blindness, red-green weak, red weak, green weak, etc. Color-blind physical examination treasure Quick color-blind test to help you identify the color and calmly deal with the physical examination. It can also be used as a tool for amblyopia training to exercise color discrimination.

title: Проверка зрения – таблица для глаз. 16+
description:
Быстрая проверка зрения с помощью офтальмологической таблицы для глаз. Узнайте какое у вас зрение. Острота зрения без очков.

Внимание! Не является лекарственным средством!
Ни в коем случае не занимайтесь самолечением. В случае серьезных проблем со зрением, таких как снижение остроты, требуется консультация врача для проверки на специальном оборудовании и постановки профессионального диагноза болезни глаз.

Данное приложение не является профессиональным инструментом для диагностики зрения, а экспериментальной разработкой для простой проверки нарушений рефракции в домашних условиях за 5 минут.

Длительное игнорирование дискомфортных симптомов в области глаз может привести к серьезным патологическим последствиям. При любых проявлениях неприятных симптомов, таких как снижение остроты зрения, быстрая утомляемость глаз, покраснения в области век следует незамедлительно обращаться к врачу.

Как проверить зрение в домашних условиях.
– Скачайте программу на телефон.
– Установите яркость экрана на максимум.
– Зафиксируйте телефон на уровне глаз в комфортном положении.
– Проследите, чтобы на экран не падали посторонние блики или тени - это будет мешать при диагностике.
– Запустите приложение.
– Отойдите на 2 метра.
– Приложение начнет показывать символы из проверочной таблицы с небольшой задержкой.
– Запомните на каком по счету слайде вы перестали четко и ясно различать символы.
– По завершению слайдов сверьтесь с офтальмологической таблицей.

В случае прогрессирующих нарушений зрения незамедлительно обратитесь на прием к окулисту.

Выполняйте зарядку для глаз каждое утро.

--
Приложение находится в экспериментальной разработке. Некоторые функции доступны не для всех версий телефонов и постепенно реализуются. 
В случае, если у вас есть предложения и/или замечания, пишите разработчикам. Мы постараемся учесть все ваши пожелания!

– Проследите, чтобы на экран не падали посторонние блики или тени - это будет мешать при диагностике.
– Запустите приложение.
– Отойдите на 2 метра.
– Приложение начнет показывать символы из проверочной таблицы с небольшой задержкой.
– Запомните на каком по счету слайде вы перестали четко и ясно различать символы.
– По завершению слайдов сверьтесь с офтальмологической таблицей.

В случае прогрессирующих нарушений зрения незамедлительно обратитесь на прием к окулисту.

Выполняйте зарядку для глаз каждое утро.

--
Приложение находится в экспериментальной разработке. Некоторые функции доступны не для всех версий телефонов и постепенно реализуются.
В случае, если у вас есть предложения и/или замечания, пишите разработчикам. Мы постараемся учесть все ваши пожелания!
summary: What is your eyesight - a table for checking eyes
recentChanges: Устранены ошибки. Доработана анимация слайдов.
comments: Very bad

title: 20-20-20. Eye doctor. Eye strain relief. Timer
description:
This app is designed to remind you to get the rest every 20 minutes. You can adjust that time. Your personal eye doctor that watch on the time that you spend on the computer and give you the advice to take the break. This is a simple timer to remind you to get rest. Get regular breaks to save your vision and keep your eyes healthy. It prevent the eye strain. Take care of your eyes. Also, this app have a scheduling feature. You can define your working period, and the app will launch automatically. 

Multiple people around the world faced with eye strain problems when working in the offices on a computer or spent time on gadgets. However, it is known that the effects of prolonged eye strain can be reduced if you regularly relax your eyes. There is a rule of 20-20-20, according to which every twenty minutes of work at the computer you need to be distracted and look for 20 seconds at any object 20 feet (6 meters) from you. That simple doing will take care of your eyes. Also, it is a good time to relax and make a stretch.  

This program is designed to help people to remind about this rule and continuously apply it to eye care. We hope that it will reduce the negative impact of gadgets on your sight. This is a simple timer and if you feel bad you have to visit a real eye doctor. 

Best regards
Apollie Soft

Enjoy and let us know how we can get better :-)
comments: Clean and small size app, but it has lot of issues and bugs. Somedays the timer wouldn't start, other times it would continue past my schedule time. Also, often if I press skip, it skips timer for whole day. Dont know why its happening..

1.In the previous version the notification was directly a full-screen popup,but now a small popup notification showing skip and show appears.This is of no use, we can't press the "show" button each and every time, we NEED a DIRECT FULL SCREEN POPUP notification after the timer period. atleast give both the options for user to choose. 2. Check out BREAK TIMER APP for windows u will get lot of ideas to customise this app. PS: I am using asus zenfone max pro m2 mobile with stock Android 9 version

Works what its supposed to do, i like how the developer listens to feedback, also the graphic for the sound button is flipped, when the sound is on is has an image of a turned off speaket and vice versa. Still a nitpick. Worth downloading
Just loved it. Minimal and effective. serves the purpose of promodoro app ✌️

Ever since classes were suspended I've been on my phone for hours on end. This caused a stabbing pain behind my eyes, probably due to eye strain. I looked into the 20-20-20 rule and found this app (its competitor didn't seem appealing) and the pain has since subsided. Dropping my screen periodically to stare out of my window is also pleasantly meditative. I've set a 40sec eye break every 35mins. I'd add 1 more star if the app didn't buzz when my screen is off. SOLID app in every other respect.

title: Eye Yoga
description:
The Eye Yoga application is based on the Bates method to set up eye exercises to improve your eyesight, relieve eye fatigue and prevent presbyopia.

You will find 11 exercises each bringing you different benefits:
* Increase blood circulation in the eyes
* Activate the lacrimal glands
* Improve circulation of intraocular fluid
* Help moisten the eyes
* Help cleanse the eyes
* Rest the eyes of light
* Strengthen the photo-receptor cells of the eyes
* Improve visual perception
* Help relax the eye muscles
* Strengthen near and far vision

These exercises coupled with a healthy diet and good hydrations will help your eyes keep their youth.

It's hard to tell without having the screen pretty well in your vision. Also, the screen should be kept awake during sessions so you don't have to keep tapping to keep it awake so you don't get behind or off.
Extraordinary expensive for such simple exercises. Not worth it at all.
Wow bait and switch scam I don't even remember downloading this app and I have a $35 charge from them all the sudden... Give me my money back please

title: iКулист - проверка зрения
description:
Современный мир, перенасыщенный экранами, заставляет нас напрягать зрение. Увы, регулярное переутомление может привести к его снижению. Как понять, пора или еще нет обращаться к окулисту? Приложение iКулист поможет в любой момент провести быстрый тест зрения для взрослых и детей!
Большую часть информации мы получаем через зрение. Постоянная работа с компьютером, неправильное освещение на рабочем месте или даже привычка читать лежа приводят к переутомлению глаз и нарушению в работе глазных мышц. Если так происходит регулярно, возникает риск ухудшения зрения - вплоть до развития близорукости и прочих негативных последствий. К сожалению, обычно этот процесс развивается незаметно для самого человека. И мы традиционно откладываем проверку зрения у окулиста до тех пор, пока не станет слишком поздно.
А ведь сохранить здоровье намного проще, чем потом пытаться его восстановить. Так зачем доводить до очков и контактных линз, когда можно вовремя принять необходимые меры? Выход прост: загрузите бесплатное приложение iКулист, которое позволит вам быстро, легко и в удобное для вас время проводить диагностику своего зрения с помощью общепризнанных тестов. Все они имеют детский режим. Это особенно важно, так как маленькие дети попросту могут не понимать, что с их зрением что-то не в порядке. И если не выявить это на ранней стадии, ухудшение зрения скажется на всей их последующей жизни.
Начать работу очень просто. Запустите приложение, расположив устройство на расстоянии вытянутой руки. Следуйте указаниям программы. В конце, согласно результатов ваших ответов, iКулист выдаст свое заключение. Если состояние вашего зрения хуже нормы, обратитесь к профильному специалисту.
Разумеется, стоит понимать, что сама программа - всего лишь инструмент, позволяющий отслеживать изменение в состоянии вашего зрения. Точность результатов может зависеть от многих факторов, в том числе, и от вашего оборудования. Поэтому iКулист никогда не заменит живого врача. Если ваши ощущения расходятся с результатами тестов приложения, не пренебрегайте своевременным визитом к окулисту. Здоровья вам и острого зрения на долгие годы!

title: Eye Care: Eye, Test, Exercise & Blue Light Filter
description:
“Take care of your eyes; you only have two of them”

61% of Americans use glasses, contact lenses or other eyesight aids; by 2050 half of the global population will be using eyesight aids in one form or other.

We have taken a very comprehensive approach towards eye care and eyesight improvement through our Eye Care: Eye, Test, Exercise & Blue Light Filter app. The main cause for eye problems as per research is stress, excessive screen use and sleep disorders. Eye doctors recommend eye exercise and periodic eye tests to keep this unique human resource in best of health. We have combined eye diagnostics and eye exercise in one app so that our users can take eye tests and be reminded of eye exercise throughout the busy work day; all in Eye Care: Eye, Test, Exercise & Blue Light Filter.

The most stress on our eyes is due to mobile screen use and that too especially at night when glare hits our eyes in dark. For that our app Eye Care: Eye, Test, Exercise & Blue Light Filter incorporates a night mode that is more than just a screen dimmer; our blue light filter renders an overlay that creates the perfect reading and viewing experience to our eyes. This blue light filter has been placed as a utility accessible in notification bar independent of Eye Care: Eye, Test, Exercise & Blue Light Filter app.

The features of our Eye Care: Eye, Test, Exercise & Blue Light Filter comprehensively cover all eye care dimensions;

•	Eye Tests
•	Eye Exercises
•	Eye Exercise Scheduler
•	Eye Care Knowledge Base
•	Eye Care Night Mode (Blue Light Filter)

For eye care the first step is taking Eye Tests; outcome of eye tests gives an insight into the condition of eyes and steps for eye care. We have included eye exam covering;

•	Eye Test for Vision
•	Eye Test for Color Blindness
•	Eye Test for Glasses
•	Eye Test for Astigmatism
•	Eye Test for Duo chrome Activity
•	Eye Test for Color Sensitivity 

Eye Care can be best done through eye exercise; Eye Care: Eye, Test, Exercise & Blue Light Filter app introduces some very basic yet effective eye exercises that are crucial for eye care. The eye exercises included are,

Open – Close Eyes

This eye exercise is best for instant stress relief and rejuvenation of vision.

20 – 20 – 20
 
This eye exercise is best of enhancing focus and vision clarity.

Eye Motion

This eye exercise is best of flexing the optic muscles and relaxation.

Eye Blinking

This eye exercise is best for energizing the eyes and removing any lethargy.


We have also included a knowledge base in our Eye Care: Eye, Test, Exercise & Blue Light Filter app that is updated with latest research and findings in the field of eye care.

Our smart scheduler is designed in a way to efficiently notify you of your eye exercise throughout the day.

Our night mode is a last minute feature that we added as a cherry on the top; the blue light filter has been adjusted to perfection for maximum relaxation of the eyes. 

The blue light filter is conveniently accessible as a toggle switch on home screen; the real magic of blue light filter can then be experienced through the notification bar widget. 

With three comfortable settings for blue light filter we recommend that for optimal eye care you use this overlay as soon as natural light is gone.

We look forward to adding new and exciting features in our Eye Care: Eye, Test, Exercise & Blue Light Filter app; your precious feedback is expected and awaited.

title: Eye Exercises - Eyes Daily Training
description:
Eye Exercises - Eyes Daily Training application will help you build the muscle of your eyes then improve your eyesight if you committed using it daily there's a reminder you can program it to remind you every day. We choose 6 best exercises that proven by doctors, they helped much of peoples before you, so what you are waiting for, install it now and start doing your exercises.
 

You go all the way to the gym for your body care, your eye care can be done on the couch. Give your eyes 5 minutes a day, and see better for the rest of your life.

That’s why we’ve developed Eye Exercises, so you can improve your eye health wherever you are, whenever you want.

Whether you’re looking to simply relax your eyes after a strained day or start seeing like you’re young again, we’ll get you there.

Join more than 2 million people who have downloaded our vision therapy app and move your eye care to the next level.

What we offer

Vision training and daily eye exercises in one sleek and fun package.

Developed with the help of eye care professionals, our eye exercises are based on the most proven techniques in ophthalmology to get you seeing the world better, sooner!

This exercises for eyes are designed to help you relax your eyes and remove existing eye tension and fatigue.

Regular eye exercises may help you to improve eyesight and prevent eye diseases such as nearsightedness and farsightedness.

PS: 
This application cannot replace the advice of your doctor.
This application cannot replace medical treatment.

title: Duochrome Acuity Test
description:
This eye test is a light form of Visual Acuity Test and is designed to reveal shortsightedness and long sightedness (hereinafter referred to as myopia and hyperopia) in the most pleasant, intuitive and stress free way for FREE.
Because this test is based on chromatic aberration and not on color discrimination, it is used even with color-blind patients.


Vision test is useful for:
- House visits
- Patients who have memorized the office chart
- Household tests for people who have doubts if a doctor's visit is required
- Schools and kindergartens
- Universities and polytechnic schools for admitting students
- Offices for recruiting workers


Features:
- Random test charts to eliminate boring and repeating experiences;
- Voice controls to help you navigate easier;
- Smooth and intuitive interface with animations.


Description:

Myopia and hyperopia are common problems. It can be hereditary, but may also occur because of eye, nerve or brain damage or due to exposure of certain chemicals. But we can usually come across with myopia and hyperopia caused by exhaustion, reading or working from wrong distance, etc.

The Duochrome Test is made with the best of intentions. The intuitive and flawless design allows you to navigate easily through the application. The voice guidance is provided during the test so that you don't need to move your mobile device near or far to read the instructions but instead you can hear the nice voice guiding you through different steps and actions. The voice can easily be muted and unmuted.

For each test you will be given a letter on two different colors to identify on which color you see the letters more clear or blurry. The randomly picked test charts will make sure you don't have a chance to memorize the provided numbers as well as answer positions so easily if possible at all. This important feature will make sure you are never bored passing this test. Also when used in offices or universities the persons passing this test will never be able to fill correct answers just because they have good memorization skills.

At the end of the test results will show whether the person has myopia or hyperopia or not for each eye separately.

More details about shortsightedness and long sightedness, eye examination tests and trainings as well as other eye related topics can be found in our news.eyeexamtest.com blog.

The Duochrome Test is continuously under improvement so your feedback is appreciated!


Tips:

- Take the most comfortable position to relax.
- Have a mild nature light and no glare on the phone screen.
- Wear your contacts or glasses if you normally do.
- Place your phone approx. 50 cm/20 inches from your eyes.
- Try to identify on which color you see the letters more clear or blurry.


Supported Languages:

- English
- Russian


SEE ALSO:

We highly recommend using our Eye Care Plus that allows to pass a more detailed eye examination as well as train your eye muscles for better vision.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.eyeexamtest.eyecareplus


DISCLAIMER:

This application is not intended to replace optician's regular full examination. We recommend you get a full eye test after using it.

- Place your phone approx. 50 cm/20 inches from your eyes.
- Try to identify on which color you see the letters more clear or blurry.


Supported Languages:

- English
- Russian


SEE ALSO:

We highly recommend using our Eye Care Plus that allows to pass a more detailed eye examination as well as train your eye muscles for better vision.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.eyeexamtest.eyecareplus


DISCLAIMER:

This application is not intended to replace optician's regular full examination. We recommend you get a full eye test after using it.

title: Mobi Optical
description:
Mobi Optical is a Complete Retail Optical Shop Management Application.
Mobi Optical provides a range of features that help Retail Optical Shop to digitize their profession.

Mobi Optical stores detailed information of Orders like:
-Order Status (Pending/Complete)
-General Details of Customers(First Name, Last Name, City, Mobile No)
-Dr. Details(Eye Checkup Date, Dr. Name, Hospital, City)
-Eye Prescription of Left & Right Eye(Distance/Near/ContactLens Spherical power , cylindrical power with axis , visual acuity , Addition and PD measurement)
-Buying Details of Full Specs/Frame/Lens(Frame Type, Frame Model, Frame Model Code, Frame Model Size, Frame Prize, Lens For, Lens Type, Lens Side, Lens Company, Lens Product, Lens INDEX, Lens DIA, Lens Prize)
-Extra Note(Any extra note about customers).

Mobi Optical stored detailed information of Frame Stock like:
- Supplier Name & Address
- Frame Type, Frame Model, Frame Model Code, Frame Model Color, Frame Model Size, Purchase Quantity
- You can also generate QR Code Sticker for stock.

Mobi Optical stored detailed information of Lens Stock like:
- Supplier Name & Address
- Lens For, Lens Type, Lens Side, Lens Company, Lens Product, Lens INDEX, Lens DIA, SPH, CYL, AXIS, ADD, Purchase Quantity

Mobi Optical also provides a way to Order your daily Lens Requirements(Single Vision, Bifocal, Plano Lens, Contact Lens in pair/box, Cosmetic Contact Lens in pair/box) to your Lens wholesaler.

In VISITBOOK you can see all of your customers' Visits with detailed information of their Eye Prescription and Buying Details.
You can send Messages or call to your customers from VISITBOOK.

Using this app,
-You can easily manage your orders.
-You can generate Customer's Bill & Print it or send it to customers via Social sharing apps.
-You can generate Customer's Eye Prescription & Print it or send it to customers via Social sharing apps.
-You can generate Job Receipt for Orders & Print it or send it to job worker via Social sharing apps.
-You can easily manage Frame Stock.
-You can Order Lens to your Lens wholesaler.
-You can search customers easily using First Name,Last Name,Mobile No. and City.
-You can view report of Dr. & their patients.
-You can view report of Frames & Lens.
-You can view report of Frame Supplier Company.
-You can view report of Frame Stock.
-You can view Sales report.
-You can view Financial Report.

The application allows a user to backup your data to Local Storage or Google Drive.So you can easily restore your data.

Supported Languages:
- English, हिंदी, ગુજરાતી, Português, Indonesian, ไทย, 简体中文, Español, عربى, Français, বাংলা, தமிழ்

* We do not collect any of your data. So it's your responsibility to regularly do backup of your data.

title: Color Blind Test
description:
Color Blindness helps to identify color deficiency,  reveals red, green or blue color blindness or any kind of color vision weakness. This Color Blindness Test includes Ishihara Color Vision Test, Farnsworth D-15 Dichotomous Color Blindness Test, and the viral Color Cube game.
It is Free, easy and very intuitive!

Color Vision Deficiency Tests included in the App:

Color Blindness - Ishihara Color Vision Test
Color Blindness is a red-green color vision deficiency test that will help to reveal color blindness.

Color Arrangement Test -  Farnsworth D-15 Dichotomous Color Blindness Test
Color arrangement test is designed to identify the type of color blindness or color deficiency in a person and the severity of the issue. In addition to the Ishihara Color test it also reveals signs of  blue-yellow color vision deficiency. 


Color Cube game 
The Hue arrangement game lets you exercise and challenge your color vision. 
By identifying the square with the different hue, and moving on to harder levels of the game, you will be able to train your color vision. 

Color blindness tests are mostly applicable for: 
- Personal vision screening to check for color perception deficiency/color blindness
- Convenience of home eye test 
- Color vision tests at various institutions
- Testing young children at home to identify color blindness at an early age

Download Color Blindness Test app and take your comprehensive color vision exam.

title: Common Eye Problems
description:
Eyes are one of the most delicate and important organs of our body. Special care must be taken for the eyes to ensure that they are always protected from dust and germs.

We must daily clean our eyes with fresh and clean water; we must eat healthy food, rich in Vitamin A to enhance our eye power. We must never apply cheap, local unhealthy eye makeup. We must never sleep with our eye makeup on.

Some of the common eye problems are:

•	Dry eye
•	Conjunctivitis
•	Teary eye
•	Cataract
•	Glaucoma
•	Far-sightedness
•	Near sightedness
•	Itchy eyes



 Here are some of the interesting topics for the same topic : 

Eyestrain
Red Eyes
Night Blindness
Lazy Eye

Colorblindness

Floaters
Dry Eyes

title: 体检视力测试
description:
这是一款可以在手机上为自己体检的应用，功能十分的齐全，让您全方位的为自己健康做一次体检。主要功能有：
1,视力体检：包含了视力表，视力检查，色盲测试，散光测试，颜色敏感度等。
2.听力检测：为你听力提供20HZ～20000等频率，为您更好的测试听力。
3.血压测量：可用手机摄像头通过算法测量您的血压，也可以自定义血压看看正常不。
4.心率测量：有手机测量功能，也有手机输入，更有心率标准可供参考。
5.肺活量测量：对手机吹气就可以测量到您的肺活量大小。
6.呼吸频率：通过光电测试，话筒测试等功能就可以测试您的呼吸是否正常。
7.血氧测量：用手指按在摄像头，通过算法就可以算出您的血氧含量。
8.心理测试：包含了各种测试：抑郁症测试，情绪测试，抗压测试，自闭症测试，性格测试，情感测试，成功测试，另类测试。

温馨提示，测量的结果可能会因为手机的型号不同而出现差异，仅供参考，如有健康问题，请及早就医。祝您一生健康。

title: Color Vision Test
description:
Biyee color vision deficiency (a.k.a. color blindness) tests  are based on research work originally carried out in the early 1990s at Cornell University. They were brought on-line in 2000. 

The online version (https://www.biyee.net/color-science/color-vision-test/)  has been used by millions of people all over the world. It has also been used by organizations to screening job candidates.

They are based on the same principles as Ishihara plates used by optometrists, but use test plates that are randomly and accurately generated at run time.  This is different from many other tests using scanned or static images that can be grossly inaccurate.  
 
The prevalence of color vision deficiency is about 5%. Most of them are caused by the missing or defect of one of the three cones in the retina responsible for color vision. If one cone is missing, it is called dichromacy which has three types corresponding to the three cones (protanopia, deuteranopia, tritanopia to L-, M-, S-cone respectively). If one cone is defective, it is called anomalous trichromacy also with three types corresponding to the three cones (protanomaly, deuteranomaly, and tritanomaly). This app is intended to identify these color vision deficiencies.

title: Görme Testi
description:
Görme Testi, gözlerinizin görme düzeyini kolayca ölçmenize yardımcı olacak bir uygulamadır. İçeriğinde Miyop, Astigmat, Renk Körlüğü ve Duochrome Testleri mevcuttur. Ekrandaki talimatlara uyarak ve size yönetilen soruları cevaplayarak gözlerinizin görme düzeyini kolayca öğrenebilirsiniz.

Miyop Testi : 
Miyop, Gözün normalden uzun olmasına bağlı olarak uzağı net görememedir. Uzağı bulanık  yakını net görür. Gözlük ve Kontakt lensin yanı sıra lazer veya göz içi mercek ameliyatı ile tedavi edilebilir. Bu test ile miyop olup olmadığınızı ve miyop düzeyinizi öğrenebilirsiniz. 

Astigmat Testi:
Gözümüzün en öndeki şeffaf tabakasının (kornea) doğuştan şekil bozukluğudur. Astigmat olanlar, baktıkları noktasal şekilleri kenarları uzamış, dağılmış olarak görürler. Bu test ile Astigmat olup olmadığınızı öğrenebilirsiniz.

Renk Körlüğü Testi:
Renk Körlüğü, kırmızı, yeşil ve mavi renklerden bir ya da birden fazlasını ayırt edememeyle ortaya çıkan bozukluktur. Renk körlüğü toplumda sıkça görülen bir görme bozukluğudur. Bu test sayesinde renk körü olup olmadığınızı öğrenebilirsiniz.

Duochrome testi: 
Gözün odaklanma yeteneğini renk çizelgeleri kullanarak sınar.

Bu testler bir göz doktoru tarafından yapılan muayenenin yerine geçmez. Bu testlerin sonucu ne olursa olsun kesin teşhis için en yakın zamanda bir göz doktoruna muayene olunuz.

title: Ejercicios para los Ojos - Mejorar agudeza visual
description:
Los ejercicios para los ojos, se recomiendan para aliviar, relajar la tensión, el estrés y esfuerzo al que exponemos nuestros ojos en la rutina diaria de Muchas horas de trabajo, y uso continuo de pantallas (teléfonos inteligentes, tabletas, consolas, tv...). Y horas de estudio en las actividades de comunicación y ocio que realizamos en el día a día.

En está aplicación encontraras un listado de 10 de los mejores ejercicios efectivos y simples para mejorar tu agudeza visual, estos ejercicios también son llamados Gimnasia ocular.

Podemos afirmar que los ejercicios visuales son muy efectivos, ya que aportan relajación, no solo a nuestros ojos, si no también para nuestra mente.

Practicarlos todos los días y dales un respiro a tus ojos, otros beneficios que aportan estos ejercicios son:

Mejorar la movilidad de los ojos 
Ayudar a fortalecer los músculos que rodena los ojos.

Ten presente que estos ejercicios no pretenden prevenir, y mucho menos corregir, los defectos refractivos. Para este problema, las únicas soluciones efectivas son el uso de anteojos o lentes de contacto.

Los ejercicios para los ojos o ejercicios visuales, se distinguen por ser simples y rápidos de realizar. (No más de 10 minutos al día), a demás son muy efectivos si eres constante en su práctica diaria.

Ejercicios que encontraras en la aplicación:

- Ejercicio 1: Parpadea un minuto
- Ejercicio 2: Gira la cabeza mientras miras hacia adelante
- Ejercicio 3: Mira a tu derecha e izquierda
- Ejercicio 4: Cierra los ojos y relájate
- Ejercicio 5: Mueve tu mirada en diferentes direcciones
- Ejercicio 6: Cierra y abre los ojos
- Ejercicio 7: Empuja tus dedos contra las sienes
- Ejercicio 8: Dibuja figuras geométricas con tu mirada
- Ejercicio 9: Mueve tus ojos hacia arriba y hacia abajo
- Ejercicio 10: Fortalecer los ojos con enfoque cercano y lejano

Los beneficios de los ejercicios visuales

La mayor ventaja de estos ejercicios para los ojos es la capacidad para relajar los músculos que los rodean y darles descanso. Es una ventaja muy significativa debido al cansancio que las pantallas electrónicas hacen a nuestros ojos. 

Si nos detenemos a pensarlo, entre trabajar con la computadora, consultar nuestro teléfono celular, buscar información en una tableta y jugar con la consola de juegos, podemos pasar casi todo el día exponiendo nuestros ojos a los efectos de las pantallas electrónicas y enfocarnos a distancias cortas . Además de ser agotador, esto puede causar molestias debido a varias consideraciones, como: ojos rojos, ojos llorosos, dolor en los músculos oculares y fatiga ocular.

⚠ ADVERTENCIA ⚠

Esta aplicación no puede sustituir el consejo de su médico.
Esta aplicación no puede sustituir el tratamiento médico.

title: Visual Test Color Blind and Miyopic
description:
Control general eye problems such as proximity or far-sightedness and much more in the comfort of your own home. With Eye Test, your eye health is in your own hands.

Take our comprehensive eye exam today

Free and simple to use tests to scan your eyes anywhere, anytime. Keep an eye on your vision and make sure you're always on top of your eye health. The Eye Test checks for some common vision problems.

Features
• Different test for two different eyes

The Eye Test can be used for:
• Personal vision screening in the comfort of your own home
• general eye examination to check if a doctor's visit is required
• vision tests in schools and workplaces
• patients who need daily vision monitoring
• prevention of eye diseases and conditions

title: Eye health: Recovery and improvement of vision -FV
description:
Hello!
My name is Sergey Khalipsky.

I developed this innovative program to restore and improve vision.
I am sure she will help you as she helped me!

The program is based on the principle of stereo imaging, but uses modern means of adaptation to the user's wishes, this makes the program an innovative solution for the prevention of hyperopia and myopia.

Regularly performed eye training allows you to:
1) Activate the metabolic processes in the eyeball, so it is possible to restore visual acuity and stop the progression of many common eye diseases.
2) Remove accumulated fatigue.
3) Training of the eye muscles improves visual acuity and adjusts the focal point.
4) Significantly increase the effectiveness of the therapy in various diseases.

For comfortable use of the program, you can configure objects as you wish.

Auxiliary tools

— Object position
Used to adjust the distance between objects.
Very handy for finding a suitable eyes focus point.

— Object size
Used to adjust the size of the object.
Thanks to this setting, you can find a convenient distance from your eyes to the subject.

— Object rotation
Used to set the angle and speed of rotation of the object.
It is much easier to focus on a moving object, so it is recommended to set the appropriate speed and angle of rotation of the object.

— Light source
Used to set the position of the lighting source of the object. A source can be one or several at a time.
Adjust the lighting as you wish, this will emphasize the shape of the object and show the play of light on its relief.

— Number of objects
Used to set the number of objects, rows and columns.
Using this function allows you to focus on several objects at the same time, as well as use the program on large screens.

— Object setting
Used to adjust the shape of the object and its texture.
This wonderful tool allows you to choose the appearance of the object from many options! And also adjust its brightness.

— Background setting
Used to adjust the background color and set the background image.
Here you can customize any background color and even more - set the image from your device!
It is very cool!

Additional functionality

— Hide
Use the "Hide" button to hide the entire toolbar if necessary.

— 3D background selection
Allows you to select predefined images of nature for the background, be sure to look at all the options, they look very nice and unobtrusive.

— Setting the time of day
You can change the light scheme to the most comfortable for the eyes - day or evening.

— Save / Load
And of course the save and load menu!
Save your favorite settings for objects and background images.

Using this wonderful program allows you to restore and even improve your vision, while it is very convenient and in a short time! If you have an eye disease, be sure to consult your doctor before using the program.

I wish you happiness and health!

title: Bluelight Filter - Night Mode
descriptionHTML:
Do you feel the light of your mobile screen is too strong?
Do you feel your eyes fatigued after watching the phone screen for a long time?
Does the glare of the screen make your eyes uncomfortable when you play phone in the bed at night?
Do you feel your vision is blurry after long-use phone?
All of these problems are caused by the blue light that emitted from the phone screen. Which will bring you eye strain and vision loss if you looked at the screen for a long time without rest.

Now, with this application, you can easily get rid of the blue light.
We have these advantages:
- Heavily reduce the blue light to relieve eye fatigue and protect your eyes;
- We have 5 different filter colors for you to choose: nature, red, brown, dark, yellow;
- You can dynamically adjust the filter strength;
- Easy to use, one one button to switch on/off;
- Stable, no force close;
- It's Free!
summary: Best tool to relieve eye strain, Reduce glare, Care your eyes, Very stable
developerAddress: AnNingZhuang West Road No.15, Haidian District, Beijing, China
comments: Simple and it works. Nothing else to say.
Great app at the moment it does what is expected of it. I even use it all of the time, including daytime.

Used to be very good, but recently it has started to turn itself on and off once or twice every minute, and creating a notification reach time it does. It's become to annoying, so I'm uninstalling it and may try again in the future. This issue seems only to affect the version on my phone. The version on my tablet continues to work well.

I have DOWNGRADED my rating from 4* down to 3* because I am fed up with this app closing itself down. None of the rare updates have rectified this issue. In fact it has got much worse gradually over time, it now happens more frequently. When it shuts down my phones standard brightness settings reactivate which is far too bright for me. I have to stop whatever I'm doing and go into the Bluelight Filter app for it to put the filter settings back to normal. I will be looking for an alternative app.

I have been looking for a blue light filter for a long time. The light on the screen has been hurting my eyes and having increasing problems with my vision. I tried many and didnt like them. Then I found this one. It is easy on my eyes and can read again. It was perfect and I didnt even need to change settings. My eyes stopped hurting. This is the best one. I wish I could put it on my laptop. I would reccomend it to everyone. It is great. Thank you for making this app.

title: Vision Therapy Handbook
description:
Vision Therapy Handbook tries to help people to know eye exercises in a convenient way. It is a collection of useful eye exercises what are proofed their success for many years in modern healthcare. 
Vision Therapy provides efficient solution to cure eye disorders like strabismus, amblyopia, lazy eye, focus problems etc...
Each exercise describes the way you should execute the exercise the tools what are needed for them and the expected beneficials.
Feel free to look after each exercise or to contact with me and you can also consult with your eye doctor if you feel that it is needed and follow up you progress in that way.
Vision Therapy Handbook tries to give a good knowladge and also a good user experience to the user to make more comfortable the exercises.

This eye doctor game will take you to the doctors adventures full of fun and turns you into a professional eye doctor. This will help the patient with various eye problems. Let's learn to take care the injured patient.

Do the eye test ,treat all sorts of eye diseases and make the patients feel better in our virtual eye doctor simulation game and become the best doctor in the town..
Time to play this simulation games and show your expert skill.

Help every patients to soothe his eyes: Patients is having irritation in her or his eyes so help his or her to rinse them quickly.
Make the sick patient happy again with the er emergency surgery in clinic.

title: Optical Store Customer Manager
description:
This app manages all your customers with their eye prescription details including Left & Right Eye(Distance/Near/ContactLens Spherical power, Cylindrical power with the axis & Prism, Addition ) & PD Adjustments also including near & Distance. 

Basic Features

-Simple design & User-Friendly Environment
The flow of this app is very user-friendly, you can manage customer and their eye prescription details with less effort. Eye prescription details including Left & Right Eye(Distance/Near/ContactLens Spherical power, Cylindrical power with the axis & Prism, Addition ) & PD Adjustments also including near & Distance, This app provides you Multiple app themes colours so you can apply the theme as per your favourite colour.

-Support Different Date format.
This app provides all Different Date formats, so select date time as per your location.
 
- Data Security 
This app provides 100% data security because we are not storing your data on our server but the data is in your mobile local storage so your data is secure and in cloud backup, your data is stored in Google drive which is also secure because without your Google login data access is not possible. 

-Barcode Scanning
You can use your mobile camera as a barcode scanner to scan the barcode of a particular customer, you can also able to search customer form their barcode so no need to type customer name while searching customer from the database.
 
-Local Backup available
This app provides you easy backup on internal storage and you can easily restore your previous backup, it’s also have stored all previous backups, there were no limits for creating backups. Your backup is stored in “Optical Store/DataBase” folder so you can easily transfer it to anywhere.

-Cloud Backup available
This app provides you to get back up in Google Drive so you can easily restore your backup in any devices so its help you when you change your mobile. To create this you have to just log in to your Gmail account and create a backup on single click. At the time of restore, you have a list of previous backups, the data will be restored by clicking one of it. 

 -Data export in Excel
If you want to print your data on a page or you have to store anywhere else then we are providing export to excel feature in which you may easily save your data into the.XLS format.
 
Other Features

title: Clinical Ophthalmology
description:
Clinical Ophthalmology has been the classic specialty app, providing the perfect ophthalmology foundation for trainees and a valuable reference source for experienced practitioners. The app retains highly effective format of succinct text and visually dynamic presentation, providing authoritative, focused guidance on the diagnosis and management of ophthalmic disorders. Extremely well organized and comprehensive in scope, this visually stunning app reflects the latest advances in the field, facilitating quick comprehension to enhance learning, aid exam preparation and guide clinical practice. As a general ophthalmic app, this is the gold standard.

General Ophthalmology has offered authoritative, state-of-the-art coverage of the diagnosis and treatment of all major ophthalmic diseases, as well as neurological and systemic diseases causing visual disturbances. The eighteenth edition builds on this tradition of excellence by offering an increased number of color illustrations, new chapters, and major revisions of existing chapters – to deliver all-inclusive coverage that encompasses pathophysiology, basic science, and the latest clinical perspectives.

A must-read for medical students, ophthalmology residents, practicing ophthalmologists, nurses, optometrists, clinicians in other fields of medicine and surgery, and health-related professionals, the eighteenth edition of General Ophthalmology features:

    New chapters on Ophthalmic Emergencies, Causes and Prevention of Vision Loss, Vision Rehabilitation, and Functional Vision Score
    A glossary of terms relating to the eye
    Contributions from more than thirty international experts
    Extensive updates and revisions throughout to reflect the latest findings and advances

this new app of Ophthalmology continues to be an unparalleled source of knowledge, providing immediate access to the detailed clinical information you need - in casualty, clinic, theatre, and on the wards.
It comprises a systematic synopsis of ophthalmic disease directed towards diagnosis, interim assessment, and ongoing management. Assessment boxes for common clinical conditions, and algorithms for important clinical presentations illustrate this practical approach. The information is easily accessed, being presented in a standard format with areas of importance highlighted. Key sections for the trainee include clinical skills, aids to diagnosis, and investigations and their interpretation. Basic perioperative care, medical emergencies and advanced life support protocols are included. New to this edition are chapters on refractive ophthalmology - containing practical advice on the treatment of refractive error by use of glasses, contact lenses and refractive surgery - and evidence-based ophthalmology - a helpful introduction to critical appraisal, levels of evidence, and medical statistics as relevant to ophthalmology.
Primarily intended for ophthalmologists, this app has become established as a valuable resource for anyone working with ophthalmic patients, whether optometrists, orthoptists, ophthalmic nurses or other health professions in ophthalmology. It has also become a core text for postgraduate examinations.

Advances in Ophthalmology and Optometry reviews the most current practices in both ophthalmology and optometry. This app identifies key areas of major progress and controversy and invites expert ophthalmologists and optometrists to contribute original articles devoted to these topics. Broken into sections, the the third Volume in the series covers topics within each of the following categories: Optometry, Cataracts, Pediatrics, Ophthalmic Pathology & Ocular Oncology, Vitreoretinal Disease, Glaucoma, Neuro-ophthalmology, Oculoplastics, and Uveitis.

title: NETRA Autorefractor
description:
NETRA is a companion app for the NETRA Autorefractor add-on for Samsung S4s. Please see more information here:  https://eyenetra.com/product-netra.html

Ideal for mobile eye clinics and vision screenings, the NETRA autorefractor measures the eye's refractive error for eyeglasses prescriptions. The user goes through a series of game-like interactions in a virtual-reality environment. In the end, the smartphone computes sphere, cylinder, axis and pupillary distance.  

The NETRA app connects the device results to the Insight platform: an on-line, HIPAA-compliant EMR. Insight provides all the necessary tools to allow eye care providers to perform refractions anywhere.

title: Eye Care - Filter and Timer
description:
Blue light is emitted from sun, fluorescent lights, CFL bulbs, LED lights, computer monitors, smartphone and tablet screens. There is concern over the long-term effects of screen exposure because of the close proximity of the screens and the length of time spent looking at them. Almost all visible blue light passes through the cornea and lens and reaches the retina. This light may affect vision and could prematurely age the eyes. Early research shows that too much exposure to blue light could lead to eyestrain, damage to retina cells and disturb the wake and sleep cycle.

Eye Care protects and relaxes the eyes by providing a filter that reduces the blue light emanating from phone screen. It also provides a timer that notifies on overuse of phone screen. With the help of timer, you can follow the 20-20-20 rule which states that every 20 minutes, take a 20-second break and focus your eyes on something at least 20 feet away.

Features

• Eye Care blue light filter reduces the effect of blue light from phone screen.

• Eye Care Session Timer records the continuous screen ON time and alerts user upon reaching the target time.

• Eye Care Day Timer records the total screen ON time in a day and alerts user upon reaching target time.

• Filter and Timer controls are available from the notification.

• Eye Care notifies its users at the end of the day about the phone usage.

title: Dunn Vision Reference
description:
*NOW AVAILABLE IN FULL, FREE OF CHARGE, WITHOUT ADVERTS*

The Dunn Vision Reference is a glossary containing advanced terms in optometry, ophthalmology and vision science. This pocket guide is an indispensable tool for medical and optometry students. Definitions are deliberately brief in order to provide the most important facts at-a-glance.

Topics covered include ocular anatomy and physiology, optics, ocular pathology, clinical techniques, visual perception and psychophysics, low vision, dispensing and orthoptics.

The app, and its content, are the work of Dr Matt J Dunn; a vision scientist and optometrist lecturer at Cardiff University. The entire contents are provided free of charge, and are aimed at students, clinicians, and the vision science community.

title: Optica-App 2
description:
Optica-App 2 is the new version of Optica-App developed entirely from scratch.

It is prepared by a server (optician and developer) and the calculation needs that occur in the task of optics and optometry have been taken into account.

This application is used to calculate, but also to show or explain to clients or patients some concepts that may be difficult to represent. This implies added value in the relationship with customers.

The application consists of 5 calculation applications:

1. Transposition: Calculates the transposition of the spherocylindrical formula and also represents the optical cross with the arrangement of the powers.

2. Distometry: Performs the calculation of spherical and / or toric powers depending on the vertex distance (lens-eye distance).

3. Over-correction in toric lens considering its rotation.

4. Addition: Calculate the theoretical addition of a person based on working distance and age.

5. Thickness of lenses *: We obtain the edge and center thickness at the main points of the lens. Of great help to advise the clients in the decision making regarding what type of lens to choose being a good selling point.

Important:

(Lens thickness *: The calculations you make are approximate and do not take into account the curvature of the lens and other parameters that lens providers can offer. For the exact calculation it is necessary to use the programs of the lens providers.)

You can improve your eye health whenever you want after a stressful day.
Use the "Eye training (Eye exercises, Eye care)" application for visual therapy and eye care.
Visual training and eye exercises are based on proven techniques in optometry and use optimal algorithms.

- High quality eye exercises
- Exercise to relax the eyes, dry eyes, lazy eyes

title: Screen Filter Blue Light, Dimmer, Eye Protector
description:
Using phones or tablet for a long time leads to eye strain and affect your sleep, Screen Filter is a free app used to reduce blue light by adjusting the screen to natural color. Shifting your screen to night mode can relieve your eyes strain, and your eyes will feel at ease during night reading. Also, Screen Filter will protect your eyes and help you sleep easily.

Screen Filter is good for reading at night, gaming or any long time usage

⭐️ Features:

🔸 Easy to use, just one tap

🔸 20 Filter color to select the most comfort for your eyes 

🔸 Brightness bar to adjust the filtering level from 0% - 100%

🔸 Notification to quickly enable or disable the filter

🔸 Widget on the home screen

🔸 Small size

🔸 Save battery life

🔸 Support phones and tablets

🔸 Support 15 languages

🔸 No creepy permissions

⭐️ Permissions:
 
⚫ Draw over other apps

⚫ Internet: used by Google AdMob



NOTE:
🔴 In first use please make sure to set device brightness to 15% at least, then enable the filter and set your settings.

🔴 Please turn off the filter before installing other apps or taking screenshots.


More tips to protect your eyes:
1️⃣ Limit screen time when you are not working. It is impossible to avoid digital devices in the workplace, but you can reduce the amount of time you spend on electronics when you are not working. Digital devices often provide a passive “escape” from reality that seems enjoyable, but it can be a poor use of your time and can just increase eye fatigue and muscle strain.

2️⃣ If you use your devices at night, download a blue light filter app. There are several free apps in your App Store that will put a filter on the screen of your smartphone or tablet to reduce glare at night. This will help reduce eye fatigue.

3️⃣ Try not to use your devices directly before bedtime. Overexposure to blue light can cause restlessness and insomnia. Set a limit of turning off your devices at least one hour before bedtime and charge your devices in a different room so you are not tempted to turn them back on.

4️⃣ Blink, blink, blink. One reason that we are more susceptible to dry eye when using electronics is that our blink rate is reduced significantly.  Put a post-it note on your computer screen that says “Blink”! Blinking more often will keep your eyes moist and refreshed.

5️⃣ Get regular comprehensive eye exams. There is no substitute for an eye exam by a licensed specialist. Schedule regular eye exams to ensure your vision stays clear and healthy. You can also talk to your ophthalmologist about prescribing protective lenses with blue light filters to reduce eye strain.

(Source: https://yoursightmatters.com/tips-reduce-hazard-blue-light/).



Privacy Policy:
https://ehlbdev.com/PrivacyPolicies/apps/ScreenFilter.html


About Us:
◼️ Visit: http://ehlbdev.com

◼️ Contact Us: ehlb.dev@gmail.com

◼️ Check out our other apps: https://bit.ly/2AN9fQK

Thank you for using Screen Filter 😊

title: Visual Acuity Test
description:
Visual Acuity Test is an application to measure your eyesight.
At a fixed distance, you choose the direction of the opening in the landolt ring.
The distances can be set to either 0.5m, 1m, 3m, or 5m. Your eyesight will then be measured between 20/200 and 40/20.(depend on distance and screen size.)

title: [ Free ]Sight Recover 3D
description:
￭ App Description 
This app uses stereograms to help improve eyesight.

There are two functions that affect eyesight—eye muscle function and brain function.
Eye muscle function controls what we generally call eyesight, and it is the ability of our eyes to focus on what we see. The brain function that affects eyesight is the ability of our brain to recognize and visualize what we see physically. In order to improve eyesight, you need to not only strengthen the eye muscles, but also increase the ability of your brain to perceive visual images.

In 3D Eyesight Recovery, by looking at a 3D stereogram, 
- you can strengthen brain functions by focusing the eyes on a 3D image, 
- at the same time you can use eye muscles that you normally do not use,
- and by switching from the walleyed method to the cross-eyed method, to opposite ways of seeing, you exercise the eyes.
- Additionally, the stereograms make it fun to continue exercising the eyes.

In other words, using the app in this way will give you the four benefits above at the same time. You will have fun while providing your eyes with good exercise.

￭ Instructions for Use
Look at the stereogram using the walleyed method and the cross-eyed method, one after the other. Use this app regularly on a daily basis.

￭ Walleyed Method (diverge) 
Instead of looking at the picture, focus on a point further ahead of the picture. If you continue to look far ahead, the two eyes you see in the upper part of the picture will look like four eyes, and then the two eyes on the inside will start to move closer together until they become one. If you move your line of vision to the picture, the flat picture will look three-dimensional. If this is your first time using a 3D stereogram, you may be surprised when this happens. It will be difficult at first, but once you get used to it, it will be easier, so do not give up.
￭ Cross-eyed Method (converge) 
In this method, you look at the left side of the picture with your right eye and the right side with your left eye. Unlike the walleyed method, you adjust the focus to a point closer to you than the picture. Place a finger between your eyes and the picture and look at your finger. The picture is behind the finger so your eyes will naturally see the opposite side of the picture, so maintain that line of vision and remove your finger. It requires some practice, but as you gradually adjust your focus, the picture will begin to appear three-dimensional.

Looking at 3D stereograms is exercise, so your eyes will get tired. Please refrain from using this app for extended periods of time so as not to tire your eyes.

title: Blue Light Filter - Eye Care
description:
☆ Don't be robbed of a good night's sleep! 

Bluelight from your smartphone or tablet causes strain on your eyes and prevents you from falling asleep easily at night.
This app adjusts your screen color temperature to reduce the harmful effect of blue light and helps your eyes to relax, making it easier for you to fall asleep.

☆ Features
▽ Free & Reliable Screen Filter App to Protect Your Eyes
You can reduce the strain on your eyes easily.
It is simple but effective!
All you have to do is launch this app and enable filter.

▽ Screen Filter with Natural Color
This app's filter has a natural color so you can read news, emails and websites clearly.
This app doesn't only dim the screen but adjusts the screen color temperature to reduce blue light which causes strain on your eyes also you can adjust intensity and darkness.
This natural color filter makes your smartphone screen shift to the screen to Night Mode.

▽ Easy Operation
It is easy to turn on or off with just one tap.
You can adjust the intensity of the filter and screen dim.
You can select color temperature from 1000k to 5000k

▽ Turn On or Off Quickly and Easily
It is easy to Enable/Disable with just one tap from notification bar.Also you can enable Quick floating setting for easy accessible to ON/OFF filter from other app without switching app

▽ Startup Automatically
App Blue Light Filter automatically starts after boot if it was enable before shut down app.

▽ Simple & Most Reliable App
This app doesn`t drain your battery except when setting up the filter, since it only adjusts the color temperature. Moreover, memory usage is also low.

What is BLUE LIGHT & How does it harmful?

Smartphone screens emit bright Blue Light so you can see them even at the sunniest times of day.
But at night, your brain gets confused by that light, as it mimics the brightness of the sun.Using smartphone in night cause inability to fall asleep

Blue light belongs to high color temperature, it’s very short and visible wavelength between 380-550 nm for circadian regulation.

How does blue light damage the eyes?

Exposure to blue light inhibits the secretion of melatonin, a hormone that influence circadian rhythms and cause inability to fall asleep.
Scientific studies shows that blue light imposes serious threats to retinal neurones and causes age-related macular degeneration(AMD)

In night Blue light causes the brain to stop producing melatonin, a hormone that gives your body the "time to sleep" cues. Because of this, smartphone light can disrupt your sleep cycle, making it harder to fall and stay asleep - and potentially causing serious health problems along the way.

The Melanopsin photoreceptor in your eyes is sensitive to a narrow band of blue light (460-480nm) which suppresses Melatonin production - an important hormone responsible for healthy sleep & wake cycles and body regeneration.
   
Blue light filter is used to reduce blue light by adjusting the screen to natural color. Shift your screen to night mode can relieve your eyes strain, and your eyes will feel ease during night reading. Also blue light filter will protect your eyes and help you sleep easily.

*** CAUTION***
Eye Care -Blue Light Filter  may cause some secured buttons (Install APK, grant permissions…) to be inaccessible.
 Please Turn OFF Blue Light Filter before tapping the button . 
When capturing a screen (screenshot) turn off the filter first, otherwise it will apply to the captured screen as well

Sorry for the inconvenience..

comments: I've tried many OCR apps (image to text converter) and none of them came close to what this app produces. Although it is still not perfect yet (which is mainly because of infinite handwriting styles), at least it doesn't produce gibberish like the other apps. I hope the algorithm keeps improving and it would be great if you could add speech for other language texts too.

Have been looking for an app to transcribe my handwritten notes to editable text for a while. Just downloaded this app after reading a positive review. The said OCR is by no means perfect, but then neither is my handwriting and so far I am actually pretty impressed. I like to save an image of the page to OneNote and then copy the transcribed text next to it. Would be great if I could setup a macro to do both in one go.

On my galaxy s9 I am using this app in tandem with quizlet (split screen view) to create a study guide. I'm surprised I couldn't find this option on google keyboard, but this is a fine alternative. Ads are annoying but never that bad, and the very empirical way the text is transcribed is much appreciated. 5 stars for functionality, overall 4.7 because ads

Top of the line, excellent for small receipts and business cards. Good for books but you might need two or three takes per page. I couldn't test it properly for handwriting during the very limited trial time allowed. Overall the development of this APP is marvelous, excellent work!

This app has been a very useful tool. I'm so grateful for the intelligence put into making it. God bless you guys. Edit. Now you can't use this app without subscription. It gives you a trial period, after which, you have to subscribe to use it. It's been good while it lasted. Goodbye, I'm uninstalling now.

title: Lazy Eye Bubble Shooter
description:
(If you experience any bug please contact me in mail I will fix it in short time)

This type of bubble shooter game can help you to improve your vision in a pleasure way. To use the application to cure lazy eye you should play the game with 3D glasses. (You can play the game without the 3D glasses too but for color adjustment it is useful.)

You can calibrate the game to be visible one type of bubble only for one eye and an other type of bubble for the other eye only in that way the eyes forced to work together as a team and help to improve vision in the most modern way.

Please read the following brief to get a picture about the purposes.

- Lazy eye \Amblyopia is a visual disorder in which the brain partially or wholly ignores input from one eye.

- The popular video game has been found to be effective at treating adult amblyopia, also known as 'lazy eye', according to new research conducted by scientists.

- Playing the puzzle game requires information to be sent to both eyes, making them work cooperatively.

- By making both eyes cooperate, the amblyopic brain is able to relearn as a result of an increase in the level of plasticity in the brain.


(You should have a two color glass (3D glasses, anaglyph glasses) the color is not important because you can adjust the colors in the app as you wish)


If you encounter any issue please contact me and send me the name of your device and a description about the issue and I will fix it as soon as possible, thanks.

title: Wysa: stress, depression & anxiety therapy chatbot
description:
Imagine a mood tracker, mindfulness coach, anxiety helper, and mood-boosting buddy, all rolled into one. Wysa, your happiness buddy is that friendly and caring chatbot. Wysa is packed with daily spiritual meditation that improves mental health and is also a perfect way to bond over family meditation. Always there for you when you need someone to talk to, Wysa helps you keep track of your mood with friendly chats and helps fight stress and anxiety with its proven techniques and calming meditation and mindfulness audios. Checking in with Wysa regularly will improve your emotional health so you can track your happiness and mood. Talk to Wysa now and psy yourself up to fight off stress. Also, Wysa has mental health assessment with depression and anxiety tests.

Wysa is your AI friend that you can chat with for free. Talk to the cute penguin or use its free mindfulness exercises for effective anxiety relief, depression and stress management. Its therapy based techniques and conversations make for a very cute and calming therapy chat app whether you're looking to cope better with mental disorders, to manage stress or to boost your mental health.

Wysa, your happiness buddy, will support you through the big and small anxieties of life by using science as a foundation to strengthen your mental health. Research-backed, widely used techniques of CBT, DBT, Yoga and meditation are employed to support you with stress, anxiety, deep sleep, loss and other mental health and wellness needs.

If you are dealing with stress, anxiety and depression or coping with low self-esteem, then talking to Wysa can help you relax and get unstuck - it’s empathetic, helpful, and will never judge. You will overcome your mental health obstacles, through empathetic conversation and free CBT therapy based technique. So, pour your heart out to your happiness buddy, Wysa as your identity will remain anonymous and your conversations are privacy protected.

Used around the clock and trusted by 500,000 people, Wysa is an emotionally intelligent chatbot that uses AI to react to the emotions you express. Unlock tools and techniques that help you cope with challenges in a fun, conversational way. For extra support, you can avail guidance from a real human coach - a skilled psychologist who will take you through the advanced coaching sessions for your needs.

You can use Wysa to rewire your mind to improve your emotional health. Fight off depression or get stress relief using cbt techniques and guided sleep meditations for optimal sleep. Here’s a look at what you can use Wysa for 👇

👂 Vent and talk through things or just reflect on your day

💪 Practice CBT (Cognitive Behavioral Therapy) and DBT techniques to build resilience in a fun way

📝 Use one of 40 conversational coaching tools which helps in dealing with Stress, Anxiety, Depression, Panic Attacks, Worry, Loss, or Conflict

💆🏻 Relax, focus and sleep peacefully with the help of 20 mindfulness meditation exercises

93% of the people who talk to Wysa find it and the tools helpful:

- Build confidence, reduce self-doubt and improve your self-esteem: core meditation and mindfulness, visualisation, confidence visualisation techniques, advanced mindfulness for self-esteem.

- Manage anger: mindfulness meditation exercises for compassion, calming your thoughts and practice breathing

- Manage anxious thoughts and anxiety: deep breathing, techniques for observing thoughts, visualization, and tension relief.

- Tired? Get a burst of energy! Visualisation and meditation exercises to increase positivity and get blissful sleep, quick yoga and physical exercises to get active

- Dealing with worry: observe mindfulness, resolving technique, challenge negativity, practice breathing techniques

- Manage conflict at work, school or in relationships: special mindfulness and visualization techniques like empty chair exercise, gratitude meditation, exercises to build skills in having difficult conversations
