comments: 2 things happened to me. First is when I started playing on a different device, I came back to this one and all my stuff is gone, also when I purchased gold, the money went out but the gold never came, I've restarted the app, I even did the purchase 3 more times, all three times it withdrew but never gave me the gold, and now with all of my tanks and everything gone. I don't even want to play the game anymore

This is the game where graphics and themes are awesome but same time their technical staff area is worst . They will keep sending you apologies ,give you some gold ,medals etc but they won't be able to restore your credits . Don't know if opponent use cheat codes or not . You will lost around 10k + credits , in a single match and that to the lower opponents . I have send them so many emails but till date they haven't resolved this issue .

2 main issues, the new update doesn't allow the "collect x amount of supply crates" mission to work meaning I'm missing out on gold, and there has been a substantial decrease in the amount of silver earned from supply crates, making it much harder to level up tanks. Also, not sure what they mean by "in game prices are now lower" as I've seen no change in prices whatsoever. Tank upgrades still show the same price as before and buying anything for gold or money is still the same price.

Great game so far easy to level up good game play great graphics events don't overwhelm you with the need to keep up pvp is optional it has plenty of options for strategy play challenging goals down side is it needs more content it has a place that said (coming soon) it has been some time and it has not been filled perhaps the devs need to install an alliance option in that spot with a leader board come on guys you have done this good keep going

Great game, 1 problem I met though on my Huawey P9: Phone's display doesn't fit the entire game display, mostly the right side, therefore I cannot tap on the right arrow in "depot - Blueprints". I gwess this can be fixed by adding a display size option in settings wich I didn't see.

title: Star Tracker - Mobile Sky Map & Stargazing guide
description:
Hey, get outdoors with your friends and enjoy star gazing! Let StarTracker guide you to explore the universe.

Just hold up and point the device to the sky and have fun! You can see any stars, constellations and deep sky objects you are watching in real time.

<< Please REMOVE the metal case or magnetic cover to avoid interference and get accurate orientation! >>
<< Calibration follow: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zrEzMggOnFQ >>

Features:
★ All data is offline!
★ Fits all screen sizes from 3.5 inch to 12 inch for any resolution!
★ Sun, Moon, Planets in Solar System, 88 Constellations and 8000+ stars visible to the naked eyes.
★ 12 Zodiac Constellations Art & some famous deep sky objects with magnificent graphics.
★ Location auto set by GPS, or set manually.
★ Auto hide all menus and enter AR track mode when you point your device to the sky.
★ Smooth motion flow and quick response which is realized by cutting edge signal processing technique.
★ Superb high quality graphic display by enabling the retina display of the device and the full screen anti-aliasing technology employment.

Pro version ($2.99 to unlock):
★ No ads & full main menu.
★ Full 88 Constellations & 100+ deep sky objects with magnificent graphics.
★ Search and guide you to stars, constellations, planets and deep sky objects.
★ 3D compass in AR mode, indicates position of objects you searched.
★ Time Machine menu and location menu to let you explore more on time and location dimension.
★ Night mode switch, protecting eye when doing star gazing outdoor.

comments: I love this app and how easy it is to use. Of note, though: if you have a magnetic case on your phone, take it off before you use this app. It kept giving me the sky for Central Africa when I'm in Arizona, USA! I love that I can turn features on and off, and the night vision is great for studying the night sky. Great for a layman like myself!

I LOVE this app. I think it's great. The compass works really really well, and it's usually pretty accurate when it comes to finding stars and constellations. My one complaint is that when I click on a notif it doesn't show up anywhere in the app. So if I see a notif and I don't read what it says or I don't really understand what it's saying I can't find out more about it after the app opens. If this one thing was fixed it would be 5/5 perfect app.

Just wish there were more options, such as when I see a notification I can close it but when the time comes I can see it again. I would also like to toggle back and forth from seeing the constellations' outlines to just seeing the stars. Overall it is a pretty cool experience when you are out in the open fields of rural Canada and can see a stellar experience.

Great app. Fun way to introduce my children to the wonders of the night sky. Just started astro photography, helping me find Galaxies of interest. My first stacked image turned out extremely well. Family and friends were very impressed.

A great app with plenty of detail & easy to use. It seems to be a lot more accurate than other similar apps I've tried. The only thing that seems to be missing is a red filter so your night sight isn't affected by looking at it. This would make it perfect & 5 stars.

recentChanges:
As much as we’d all like, big changes unfortunately don’t happen overnight. That’s why we’ve introduced habit coaching—a new way to help clients make small, sustainable lifestyle changes! Trainers can now create habits within our Master Habit Library and prescribe them to clients. As clients complete habits each day, they will earn habit streaks and unlock special achievement badges over time.
As always, we’ve also made some back-end upgrades and bug fixes to make your experience even better.

 मानव नेत्र के कार्य की सामान्य जानकारी हिंदी में    -    General information on the function of the human eye in Hindi


यह एप्प कक्षा  8 , 10,12 के लिए लाभकारी है 
इसके अलावा यह b.sc करने वाले छात्र - छात्राओं के लिए और डॉक्टरों के लिए भी लाभदायक है

This app is beneficial for Class 8, 10,12
Apart from this, it is beneficial for students who are b.sc and for the students too.





मानव नेत्र शरीर का वह अंग है जो विभिन्न उद्देश्यों से प्रकाश के प्रति क्रिया करता है। आँख वह इंद्रिय है जिसकी सहायता से देखते हैं। मानव नेत्र लगभग 10 करोड़ रंगों में अन्तर कर सकता है।
नेत्र शरीर की प्रमुख ज्ञानेंद्रिय हैं जिससे रूप-रंग का दर्शन होता है। मनुष्य के दो नेत्र होते हैं।
इसके विषय इस प्रकार है -  

The human eye is the organ of the body that acts towards light with different purposes. The eye is that sense of sight. The human eye can differentiate about 10 million colors.

The eye is the major sensory of the body, which is the form of color. Humans have two eyes.
The subject is as follows -



1. परिचय
  parichay
2. आँख की संरचना
  Estructura del ojo
3. नेत्रगोलक की गुहाएँ
  Cavidad del globo ocular
4. लेंस
  Lente
5. आँखों की सहायक संरचनाएँ
  Estructuras auxiliares de los ojos
6. आँसू
  Lágrimas
7. नेत्र पेशियाँ
  Músculos de los ojos
8. पलकों की पेशियाँ
  Músculos párpados
9. दृष्टि तन्त्रिका एवं दृष्टि पथ
  Nervio óptico y camino de visión
10. दृष्टि की क्रिया विधि
  drshti kee kriya vidhi
11. दृष्टितीक्ष्णता
  Astigmatismo
12. वर्णबोध
  Explicación
13. वर्णांधता
  Cromatopsia
14. द्विनेत्री दृष्टि
  Vista binocular
15. भेंगापन
  Entrecerrar
16. नेत्र परीक्षण
  Examen de la vista
17. आँख के रोग
  Enfermedades oculares
18. समायोजन
  Ajuste

 ::Note::
कर्पया एप को गूगल प्ले स्टोर पर रेटिंग प्रदान करें और इस को बना ने के हमारे प्रयास को सार्थक बनाये!

title: Hiya - Call Blocker, Fraud Detection & Caller ID
description:
Call blocker, fraud detection & phone number lookup - meet Hiya, your reliable protection from fraud numbers and spoof calls, with integrated caller ID. Block spam calls for good!

Get FREE spam call alerts and block spam phone calls automatically. Hiya shows you the true caller ID so you always know who’s on the other end of the line.

Here’s why users rate Hiya:

• Spam call blocker - block spam calls automatically, hassle-free
• Phone number lookup - whether it’s a friend, robocaller or a fraud number, Hiya gives you real-time context on who’s calling
• Spam alerts and fraud detection - automatic spam alerts warn you about incoming spam phone calls from fraud numbers. You can also report spoof calls to the Hiya community
• Virus protection & phone security - Hiya detects fraud numbers for you, so you know when you’re being called by a scammer. 
• Manage contacts - add names and addresses from Hiya to your phone book contacts

Download now for free and get instant protection from spoof calls, fraud numbers or a robocaller. Our features let you take control and block spam calls automatically.

VIRUS PROTECTION & SECURITY
Our advanced phone spam protection engine identifies and blocks any robocaller, telemarketers, debt collectors and fraud calls like neighbor spoofed call scam.

CALL BLOCKER & SPAM ALERTS
Block spam calls and spoof calls automatically - it’s easy! Stop the “neighbor spoofing” calls from numbers that look similar to yours.

CALLER ID
Turn an unknown caller into a name. Whether it’s a call from a business, friend or potential spammer, our global database of caller names and spam detection gives you real-time context on who’s calling.

PHONE NUMBER LOOKUP
Phone number lookups helps you identify a call from an unsaved contact. Find out the true caller name and whether a fraud number or robocaller is calling you.

MANAGE CONTACTS
Add names and addresses from Hiya to your phone book contacts to keep them accurate, complete, and current.

Download now for reliable virus protection  and never pick up a spam phone call again!

COMMUNITY
Facebook: https://facebook.com/hiyainc
Twitter: https://twitter.com/hiya
Instagram: https://instagram/hiyainc

The SMS text blocker feature is currently not supported for devices with Android 4.4 (KitKat) and higher.
Hiya Caller ID & Call Block (formerly Whitepages Caller ID & Security Call Blocker) is brought to you by Hiya Inc. Utilizing the power of the Hiya database that has hundreds of millions of phone numbers, you’ll know the true caller behind more calls and SMS texts. Hiya is a Google Play Top Developer that is committed to delivering best in class free security, caller ID, call block, nuisance & virus protection.

recentChanges: Hiya! In this update we improve the call blocking experience for users on Android 10 (“Android Q”) and higher: incoming calls that you wish to block will now be blocked completely, and not forwarded to voicemail! You can enable this behavior by setting Hiya as your default caller ID app. Please let us know of any feedback regarding this change. We also squashed some bugs and ensured things are running smoothly overall.
comments: Good but slow on my Galaxy Note 9--specifically when opening, accessing call logs, and opening the search page. Also, no easy way to copy phone numbers to clipboard. It used to identify spam sms texts but seems to no longer. I'm a longtime user on the annual premium plan. Have to keep uninstalling and reinstalling every couple weeks to restore my subscription. Solve these things and it's 5 stars.

So far this app has been great, I've been bombarded with spam/fraudulent calls for months interrupting the current phone calls I'm on, my zoom meetings, Microsoft office meetings, ect. The only thing I believe could be a improvement would be, and if it's already a option it isn't explained well on how to use it, is to be able to trace back a spam/unknown phone number to see what the company's name or address is. So I/you know for sure you want to block that phone number.

🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 Boy I cannot live without Hiya! There is just one problem though, I wish it gave you more options to do with the call instead of either just send to your voicemail or do nothing. I think it would be great if you could block everyone but the people on your contact list! Like I said Hiya is the best! I will give them a five star rating every time. Thank you Hiya👄

I paid to block calls from area codes and it just isn't doing that. It still rings 6+ times a day from numbers I have blocked and will block numbers I haven't put ìn my block list. 2 stars because it is nice to know where the call is coming from so I can ignore it but minus 3 for not blocking my blocked numbers.

It does the job with stopping unwanted spam and fraud calls. I had a number that kept calling me stating they were social security trying to scam me out of money. They would call from different numbers once I downloaded this app hiya blocked the calls. Now I have some kind of peace. This app is definitely worth the Fee.

title: PhotoScan by Google Photos
description:
PhotoScan is a new scanner app from Google Photos that lets you scan and save your favorite printed photos using your phone’s camera.
 
 Picture perfect and glare free
 
 Don’t just take a picture of a picture. Create enhanced digital scans, wherever your photos are.
 
 – Get glare-free scans with an easy step-by-step capture flow
 
 – Automatic cropping based on edge detection
 
 – Straight, rectangular scans with perspective correction
 
 – Smart rotation, so your photos stay right-side-up no matter which way you scan them
 
 Scan in seconds
 
 Capture your favorite printed photos quickly and easily, so you can spend less time editing and more time looking at your bad childhood haircut.
 
 Safe and searchable with Google Photos
 
 Back up your scans with the free Google Photos app to keep them safe, searchable, and organized. Bring your scans to life with movies, filters, and advanced editing controls. And share them with anyone, just by sending a link.

summary: Photos from the past, meet scanner from the future.
recentChanges:
Easier capture and save
Scanned photos are saved to your device on capture.

Improved corner editor
In addition to the corners, you can now drag the edges to adjust the automatic cropping of your scanned photo.
comments: I'm not sure why people are having so much trouble with this app. I love that I'm able to quickly scan old family pictures and share them with others in Google Photos. It's easy to scan the photos, and even if you do tilt your phone, you can adjust the corners easily afterward. I've had a lot of success scanning hundreds of pictures already. Thanks for the great app!

Well . . .! I am having a fair degree of success unlike some other reviews. I reduced glare by repositioning the photo relative to my light source. Have had this app for several months but only used it today for the first time on my new phone which has a good macro camera. I note scans are saved to phone, not external card, why not? Seems to overwrite my preferred camera save location so I have to jump through hoops to then transfer files to external card. Not so good 🙂

The sreps the steps taken in order to Scan are more frustrating, than they should be. Holding the camera to the four corners of the photograph " without tilting the camera" allowed the while holding steady was frustrating if impossle with a smart phone. The resulting images were very poor. I tried just using the stocked functions that came with my androids camera and got easer shots with sharper images. I'm sorry guys, I feel generous giving it 2 stars. You're google you should be No. 1 !/

First time use was okay. Then it began not get the scan. You have to move the phone to the four circles to complete the scan. An you only have about 30-40 seconds to do. Which is difficult since your not supposed to tilt the phone. Was unable to find any settings to increase the time frame or adjust the scan time. I am looking for another app that is easier to use.

Terrible quality scans of photos. I got much better quality and higher resolution by just taking a picture of the old 4x6 photo with the camera on my phone. Great idea but poor execution. Hopefully it improves with time because usually I love stuff by Google.
